snippet.title: Intellivision PGA Golf
snippet.description:
the one and only "Intellivision PGA Golf".

i can't tell how many times i played it, still it's hard to stay on par.
the game uses already a animated golfer and a sort of "triple click", while the length of a club is fixed on full/med/short swing, you control with the release of the action button only slice or hook (or straight if you hit the point). certain trees get placed randomly and their size varies as well as the wind direction varies (even if you don't see that). it was a clever golf game for those days.
